title: Vibe Coding - 25 Min Electronic Focus Music | Pravos Deep Work Sessions
description:
Experience Vibe Coding - a 25-minute electronic journey designed for coding, development, and technical deep work.

I'm a remote developer. I built Pravos (www.pravos.xyz) for people like me who need uninterrupted focus. One workspace. Music that doesn't demand attention. A timer that doesn't buzz you out of flow. Tasks that keep you on track.

This album is electronic and energetic, built for the kind of deep technical work that requires sustained concentration. Same 25-minute arc. Different vibe.

Try Pravos: www.pravos.xyz
